name: slashwarp
title: /warp
description:
[font=default-bold]transform into a rocket and launch yourself across the map![/font]
this mod adds the following chat commands:
[entity=compilatron] /warp <name> - launch yourself towards the named waypoint 
[entity=compilatron] /setwarp <name> - save your current position as a waypoint 
[entity=compilatron] /removewarp <name> - remove a saved waypoint 
[entity=compilatron] /listwarps - print a list of saved waypoints in chat
author: asher_sky
